Articles.Content:
Hi,

So, i downloaded Karbonite from Github.

The installing process went perfectly fine.

Until i want to scan for resouces using the provided scanner.

I had no opinions to scan for karbonite, or any choices at all in fact to scan.

I have installed OKS,MKS, and ORS.

I cannot edit the action groups at all.

~Any advice at all will help! Thank you!

I think you need SCANsat installed, but the 8.1v of SCANsat doesn't work with Karbonite. You'll need one of the newer dev builds.

If you're playing career mode in .90, then you won't have access to action groups until you upgrade your VAB or SPH. This is a vanilla mechanic, not mod related.
